events.title: The City Knows Your Name
events.text_stub: Newsfeeds loop your face. Every patrol expects you. The city shifts its eyes toward the horizon where you stand.

choices.text: Disappear into the seams and go quiet.

events.title: The Registry Opens
events.text_stub: Mandatory registration arrives with soft language and hard timetables. A line forms outside a cold, new office.

choices.text: Submit to the registry and control the narrative.
Refuse and rally others to stay hidden.

events.title: A Signal Beyond the Sky
events.text_stub: Static spills through every channel. The stars answer with a tone that only you can hear.

choices.text: Send a response into the void.
Shield the city from whatever listens.
